subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Any refrigerated or cooling chamber, or the like which is of sufficient size for a person to enter must—

ol.li: have adequate means of communicating with or alerting other occupants in the building in the case of an emergency; and

have a door which is—
of adequate dimensions to allow occupants to readily escape; and
openable from inside without a key at all times.
